name: CbcGeneralDepth

algorithms.name:
Lookahead Branching with Partial Evaluation
Copyright (C) 2002, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcGeneralDepth: Advanced branching using partial evaluation (lookahead).
Instead of simple two-way branch, evaluates the search tree to a
specified depth and creates subproblems from the resulting nodes.

Uses ClpNode infrastructure (from Clp) for efficient node representation
during the lookahead phase. Can generate multiple subproblems from a
single branching decision.

Also includes:
- CbcGeneralBranchingObject: Multi-subproblem branching action
- CbcOneGeneralBranchingObject: Single subproblem selection

Supports orbital branching for symmetry handling.

see:
ClpNode, ClpNodeStuff for Clp integration

Edwin 11/10/2009 carved out of CbcBranchActual
